Package edu.monash.fit2099.engine.capabilities

Interface Capable

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    Actor, Bottle, Bowser, Bug, CapabilitySet, Coin, Crater, Dirt, Enemy, Fire, Floor, Floor, Floor, FlyingKoopa, Goomba, Ground, HealingWater, HealthFountain, Item, Key, Koopa, Lava, LockedDoor, MagicItem, MartianItem, Mature, PiranhaPlant, Player, Player, Player, PowerFountain, PowerStar, PowerWater, PrincessPeach, Sapling, Sprout, Stick, SuperMushroom, Toad, Tree, Tree, Wall, Wall, WarpPipe, WeaponItem, Wrench, Yoshi, YoshiEgg
    public interface Capable
    An interface for representing a collection of any kind of enum. A practical alternative to type introspection and other problems.
